metadata.synopsis: Goblin talking about that chump hero the Blade of Frontiers
metadata.how_to_trigger: - loadlevel WLD_Main_A - goto 247.23; 40.947; 25.989- Talk to Warrior Plagg

0.speaker: Warrior Plagg
0.text: Keep moving, 'less you're wanting a clubbing and drubbing.

1.speaker: Warrior Plagg
1.text: Make a wrong move, and Boss Ragzlin'll chew you up and spit out the chunks!
